content:
US 3 • Linguistics for Fun and Profit • David G. Kay • UC Irvine

Supplementary Resources on Course Topics

These links and books explain or illustrate some of the topics we've covered in class, typically in more detail. They're supplementary, not assigned, unless we say otherwise.

 

  • Textbook: Linguistics Wikibook
  • Phonetics
    • Animated pronunciation head
  • Various Languages
    • Major world languages (infographic) and another link to the same content
    • North American English Dialects (Browse around and click on dialect names for samples)
    • The book Talk Like a Californian presents a linguist's analysis of distinctively Californian dialect patterns
